actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from income, for purposes of determining eligibility and benefits, certain funds used for textbooks, supplies, and transportation incidental to attending postsecondary institutions and schools for the handicapped.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from income for purposes of food stamp eligibility specified educational assistance used for textbooks, supplies, and transportation incidental to attending postsecondary institutions or schools for the handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from income, for purposes of determining eligibility and benefits, certain funds used for textbooks, supplies, and transportation incidental to attending postsecondary institutions and schools for the handicapped.
